name: Robot Death Arena
description:
ROBOT DEATH ARENA

Aside from a game jam I participated in a few months ago, this is the first "game" I've made that I'm sharing with the public. Robot Death Arena was born of my post-game jam excitement for Unity game development. It was never honestly meant to amount to much, it was meant as a tool for me to learn (as well as a dumping grounds for mistakes I'd rather not make on future projects). 

However, after a while the game grew to a point where it felt like a shame not to at least compile it and share it here on itch. So here it is - the current version (0.1) of the game. It's very feature incomplete, asset incomplete (missing sounds/effects, etc). But it basically works. The interface is atrocious, but again.. it is what it is.. for the time being. The project is on hold for now while I explore bigger and better things, but I may return to it in time.

In the meantime, let me know what you think of this very early prototype! Thanks for checking it out.  :)

CONTROLS

  • Movement - WASD
  • Aiming - Mouse
  • Fire - Left mouse button
  • Boost - Direction + LSHIFT (can be used to cover distance, back away, or dodge)

CREDITS

  • Programming: Meneliki
  • Robot Art: Meneliki
  • Special effects: Meneliki
  • Sound:  Meneliki
  • Skull Logo: A heavily modded version of something I found online
  • Music: Asset Store (forget the exact user, sorry.)
  • Textures: Random royalty free textures online

DISCLAIMER

Robot Death Arena is NOT a commercial product and is in no way intended to generate revenue of any kind. All assets in-game were either created by myself or found royalty free online.
